original_text: They reached the place of Kidon's threshing floor. There the oxen that were pulling the cart almost fell. So Uzzah reached out to hold the Covenant Box to stop it falling.
korean_text: 기돈의 타작 마당에 이르러서는 소들이 뛰므로 웃사가 손을 펴서 궤를 붙들었더니

sentences.original_text: They reached the place of Kidon's threshing floor
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 기드의 타작 마당 장소에 도착했습니다

sentences.original_text: There the oxen that were pulling the cart
So Uzzah reached out to hold the Covenant Box
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 웃사가 손을 뻗어 언약궤를 붙잡았습니다
